specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Washer Washer is a post-treatment mainly applied to woven fabrics with a sturdy structure. Through washing processes, it induces slight shrinkage and creates natural creases and streaks, adding a vintage-like appearance and texture to the fabric.
specifications.Dye Method: Tie Dye Tie-dyeing utilizes unique folding and knotting techniques, resulting in one-of-a-kind color and pattern variations for each piece. The yardage may also differ slightly from the photos online or swatches you previously received.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Recommended Use Nylon Shorts, Windbreakers
